DOC.brief_summary: Behavioral weight loss program successfully reduce body weight , program available limited number overweight obese individual . This project evaluate unique weight loss approach combine self-sustaining weight loss campaign ( outreach ) train behavioral weight loss strategy test efficacy add component design enhance accountability increase motivation weight loss .
DOC.brief_title: State-wide Health Approach Increase Reach Effectiveness : Study 2
DOC.detailed_description: This randomized trial . Participants randomly assign 1 3 treatment arm : ( 1 ) Shape Up Rhode Island ( community-based weight loss campaign ) plus Internet-based behavioral weight loss program ( SURI+IBWL ) , ( 2 ) SURI + IBWL + optional group session ( SURI+IBWL+Group ) , ( 3 ) SURI+IBWL + monetary incentive submit self-monitoring information achieve clinically significant weight loss . The primary outcome weight loss 12 week .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Body mass index > =25 kg/m2 2 . English speak 1 . Health problem make weight loss unsupervised exercise unsafe 2 . Current pregnancy plan become pregnant next 12 month 3 . Planned relocation 4 . Previous participation Shape Up Rhode Island research study
